gui

Class Render

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.Render
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Render
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner
    Main class to display all layers with effects on-screen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
